title: Side Stand - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Lubricate the pivot bolt shoulder and side stand pivot with multipurpose grease.
Apply one gramme of ThreeBond 1360 to 50% of the threads, not including the first two threads.
Fit the stand to the side stand bracket and insert the pivot bolt, tightening it to
Fit a new lock nut to the pivot bolt. With the aid of an assistant, hold the pivot bolt to prevent rotation and tighten the lock nut to
Position the side stand switch to the side stand bracket and tighten the new fixings to
Position the side stand assembly to the frame, fit and tighten the fixings to
Wear hand, eye and face protection when fitting the stand spring. Take great care to minimise the risk of personal injury and loss of components.
In the orientation noted during removal, hook the spring onto its frame lug then carefully hook it onto the stand lug.

body.name: Side Stand Spring and Fixing, L0252

body.body: Check the operation of the side stand before riding the motorcycle. Ensure the spring holds the stand securely in the retracted position.
